name: elite-project-management
description: Management scripts for Elite Project deployment and synchronization

scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:store-backend && npm run build:admin
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m "Auto deploy: $(date)" && git push origin main && node deploy-to-server.js
scripts.sync: git pull origin main && echo "âœ… Synced with remote repository"
scripts.quick-push: git add . && git commit -m "Quick update: $(date)" && git push origin main

author: Elite Project Team
